headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MCLEAN, LINDA DURFEE

snippet: McLEAN--Linda Durfee. The Board of Governors of Squadron A Association and the Board of Trustees of Squadron A Foundation deeply mourn the passing of Linda, the beloved wife of the late COL Robert L. McLean, Squadron A's esteemed Board Chair and President for many years. Linda was a longtime member and staunch supporter of both organizations and served with distinction as a Governor and Trustee. We will miss her friendship, sense of humor and wise counsel. We extend our sympathy to her sister, stepdaughters and their families and her many friends. At long last she and Bob are together again. Major General Edward G. Klein, Board Chair Michael D. Witter, President Squadron A Association and Squadron A Foundation 1/3
lead_paragraph: McLEAN--Linda Durfee. The Board of Governors of Squadron A Association and the Board of Trustees of Squadron A Foundation deeply mourn the passing of Linda, the beloved wife of the late COL Robert L. McLean, Squadron A's esteemed Board Chair and President for many years. Linda was a longtime member and staunch supporter of both organizations and served with distinction as a Governor and Trustee. We will miss her friendship, sense of humor and wise counsel. We extend our sympathy to her sister, stepdaughters and their families and her many friends. At long last she and Bob are together again. Major General Edward G. Klein, Board Chair Michael D. Witter, President Squadron A Association and Squadron A Foundation 1/3
